entries.title: Dreamroot
entries.summary: A silver-veined tuber steeped in lullaby sap. Stewards brew it to restore wandering minds to dreaming sleep.

entries.title: Honeyglobe Capsule
entries.summary: Translucent pods that ripen only by moonlight. Their nectar stabilises volatile tonics for the Guild apothecaries.

entries.title: Chorus Spore Cluster
entries.summary: Fungal blooms that echo hymn fragments from the sunken Choir. Harvesters wear masks to avoid singing along forever.

entries.title: Glassfern Scribes
entries.summary: Fronds as clear as vellum that capture whispered secrets in refracted light. Archivists trade entire libraries for one spool.

entries.title: Moonlace Bloom
entries.summary: Latticed petals that unfurl only when palace bells fall silent. Their pollen renders gold illusions briefly transparent.

entries.title: Emberleaf Vines
entries.summary: Slow-burning creepers woven through festival floats. When braided correctly they warm whole caravans without smoke.

entries.title: Tidal Iris
entries.summary: Bioluminescent petals that sway in rhythm with the underground sea. Sailors wear them to sense incoming reverse currents.

entries.title: Starlit Bramble
entries.summary: Thorny coils that drink meteor light and release it in gentle pulses. Sky shepherds knot them into lantern crowns.

entries.title: Whisper Willow
entries.summary: A slender tree whose leaves mimic the cadence of nearby voices. Diplomats consult it before tense negotiations.

entries.title: Gloomcap Mantle
entries.summary: Shelf fungi that weave themselves into cloaks, absorbing stray light. Miners wear them to walk unseen past patrols.

entries.title: Dawnmire Reed
entries.summary: Hollow reeds that fill with dawn mist and chime softly when danger nears. Marsh guides plant them along safe crossings.

entries.title: Auric Marrow
entries.summary: Root clusters that distil stray wealth into nourishing broth. Street healers ration it to those who give more than they keep.

entries.title: Zephyr Peony
entries.summary: Wind-fed petals that store the memory of every breeze. Airship navigators read them like logbooks before setting sail.

entries.title: Umbral Mistle
entries.summary: Shadow-drinking vines prized by theatre troupes to deepen stage illusions. Too much contact stains skin with twilight.

entries.title: Wanderer's Ember
entries.summary: Coal-bright moss that only ignites when a traveler hums their departure song. Guides plant it along the Wanderer's Causeway to keep midnight caravans visible.

entries.title: Archive Lichen Scroll
entries.summary: Filigree lichens that unfurl into script when brushed with lantern soot. Record keepers in the Archive Warrens braid them into living ledgers.

entries.title: Tidelight Caul
entries.summary: Ribboned kelp that stores moonlight in brine pockets. Tideglass wardens stretch it across arches to guide bathyspheres through pitch currents.

entries.title: Shatterlight Thistle
entries.summary: Prismatic spines that refract forge embers into calibrating beams. Artificers of the Shatterlight Forge use them to temper dreaming steel.

entries.title: Mint Cluster
entries.summary: Sharp, dew-fed sprigs cultivated beneath gauze hoods. The Perfumer steeps them into incense that coaxes shy familiars back to the market square.

entries.title: Sparkling Mineral
entries.summary: A faceted stone that thrums softly when held near unfinished blueprints. Visionaries insist it remembers every structure raised above the deep tunnels.

entries.title: Golden Cap Sphere
entries.summary: A sealed orb of condensed mushroom fog. Alchemists use it to bottle a moment of clarity before the palace bells resume their din.

entries.title: Teal Crown Root
entries.summary: Ribboned roots braided for parade regalia. Torchbearers trade them to the Mayor to signal that the gate may open at last.

entries.title: Sunspore Eye
entries.summary: A polished lens grown from festival spores. It stores snapshots of joy until a friend needs reminding that light still lingers underground.

entries.title: Ambercrest Lantern
entries.summary: An amber-caged lantern tuned for fog-choked tunnels. Torchbearers beg gardeners for one more flask of its patient light.

entries.title: Lost Camera
entries.summary: A battered camera wrapped in moss. The Sporeborn believe it can capture a dream before the Palace edits the memory away.

entries.title: Blooming Robes
entries.summary: Choir vestments stitched with living mycelium. Fungalmongers claim each bloom still hums with the verses it once absorbed.

entries.title: Umbral Iris Lens
entries.summary: A petal-thin lens that filters shadow pollen into luminous bands. Pollinators rely on it to choreograph their swarm ballets.

entries.title: Bio-Copper Bar
entries.summary: A copper ingot laced with fungal veins. Apprentices smith it to learn how metal can flex without breaking a dream.

entries.title: Stillmoon Vessel
entries.summary: A glassy amphora that catches moonlight before it touches the ground. Gossamer weavers anchor frayed memories with its glow.

entries.title: Crimson Dome Key
entries.summary: A coral-red key recovered from the mines. Gatherers swear it unlocks storerooms the Palace meant to forget.

entries.title: Bottled Salve
entries.summary: Herbal balm distilled for gardeners who refuse to rest. A single drop soothes joints strained by coaxing stubborn blooms.

entries.title: Carapace Aperture
entries.summary: An articulated shell ring that bends light around the wearer. Mothwing scouts use it to slip between dream-thinned paths.

entries.title: Lilac Crown Terrarium
entries.summary: A stage-top terrarium holding miniature parade floats. The Maestro listens to its rustling fronds for new arrangements.

entries.title: Glassmoss Umbrella
entries.summary: A translucent canopy grown from moss that deflects both rain and harsh sun. Florists cherish it when taming temperamental beds.
